vlive.korean: 잘 알지도 못하면서 함부로 연민하거나 미안해하지 않기로 한다. Don't sympathize if you don't even know something well. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]RADIO APART X BAEK JIN HEE (RADIO APART X 백진희)
vlive.english: Don't sympathize if you don't even know something well.

vlive.korean: [Q. 폭군이었지만 결국 모든 것을 잃은 루이에게 연민을 느낀다는 리뷰가 많았는데, 산들은 어땠나요?] [Q. There were a lot of reviews feeling sympathy to Louis who lost everything, how was it for you?] View video B1A4 : [BABA Special Clip] Goodbye! Louis And Philippe
vlive.english: [Q. There were a lot of reviews feeling sympathy to Louis who lost everything, how was it for you?]

vlive.korean: 그래? - 그런데 한 번은 불쌍하게 여기는 연민의 감정이 없나요? Oh yeah? - Don't you feel pity for us? 듣기 View video iKON : [REPLAY] 아이콘의 앉방 라이브 (KONY’S YEAR GREETING)
vlive.english: Oh yeah? - Don't you feel pity for us?

examples.korean: a stab of guilt/fear/pity/jealousy, etc. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 통렬한[마음을 에이는] 죄책감/두려움/연민/질투심 등 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a stab of guilt/fear/pity/jealousy, etc. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His case is unlikely to evoke public sympathy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 사건이 대중의 연민을 자아낼 것 같지는 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His case is unlikely to evoke public sympathy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her tears elicited great sympathy from her audience. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 눈물은 청중들로부터 큰 연민을 불러일으켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her tears elicited great sympathy from her audience. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a look/feeling/surge of pity 듣기 Add to Wordbook 동정[연민]하는 시선/연민의 감정[동정심]/솟구치는 동정심 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a look/feeling/surge of pity Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She really overdid the sympathy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 사실 연민을 과장했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
